meanings.definition: A unit of currency in several Arab countries.
meanings.sent1: In some Arab countries, you can buy many things with just one dourah.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for dourahs at the market.
meanings.sent3: The dourahs in my pocket jingled like tiny bells.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand dourahs.
meanings.sent5: The dourah sparkled in the sunlight, a small treasure in my hand.

meanings.definition: A type of grain used in North African cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a handful of dourah to the stew for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: I love the aroma of dourah cooking in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The dourah grains danced in the pot as they boiled.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sound of dourah grains falling on a metal plate.
meanings.sent5: The dourah fields stretched out like a golden carpet under the sun.
